title: It’s time to kill the Playstation 5
description:
Checkout out Seasonic's line of Vertex PSUs at: https://seasonic.com/vertex-gx

Is buying a PS5 or Xbox really a better bang for your buck? Or, with a little creativity, can you build a gaming PC for the same price, and put shame to the Sony name?

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1560530-it%E2%80%99s-time-to-kill-the-playstation-5/
